text: The following is a list of indoor arenas in Bosnia and Herzegovina, ordered by capacity. The venues are by their final capacity after construction for seating-only events. There is more capacity if standing room is included (e.g. for concerts). ==Current arenas== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Image !! Stadium !! Capacity !! City !! Team !! title: List of indoor arenas in Bosnia and Herzegovina
